spells_per_day.description: Based on class level and casting ability modifier

level_increases.description: Increase any ability score by 1 every 4 character levels

skill_check.armor_check_penalty: Applied to Str and Dex-based skills when wearing armor

synergy.description: 5+ ranks in certain skills provide +2 synergy bonus to related skills

armor_class.formula: 10 + armor_bonus + shield_bonus + dex_modifier + size_modifier + natural_armor + deflection + dodge

spells.target: Up to five creatures, no two of which can be more than 15 ft. apart
spells.description: A missile of magical energy darts forth from your fingertip and strikes its target, dealing 1d4+1 points of force damage.
spells.name: Magic Missile

spells.description: When laying your hand upon a living creature, you channel positive energy that cures 1d8+1 points of damage (maximum +5).
spells.name: Cure Light Wounds

spells.description: A fireball spell generates a searing explosion of flame that detonates with a low roar and deals 1d6 points of fire damage per caster level (maximum 10d6) to every creature within the area.
spells.name: Fireball

feats.name: Acrobatic
feats.description: You have excellent body awareness and coordination.

feats.name: Alertness
feats.description: You have finely tuned senses.

feats.name: Animal Affinity
feats.description: You are good with animals.

feats.name: Cleave
feats.description: You can follow through with powerful blows.

benefits: Trade attack bonus for AC bonus
feats.name: Combat Expertise
feats.description: You are trained at using your combat skill for defense.

feats.name: Combat Reflexes
feats.description: You can respond quickly to threats.

benefits: +1 dodge bonus to AC against one opponent
feats.name: Dodge
feats.description: You are adept at dodging blows.

feats.name: Empower Spell
feats.description: You can cast spells to greater effect.

benefits: +4 bonus on checks for extended activity
feats.name: Endurance
feats.description: You have exceptional endurance.

benefits: No penalty with chosen exotic weapon
feats.name: Exotic Weapon Proficiency
feats.description: You understand how to use an exotic weapon.

benefits: No limit on cleave attacks per round
feats.name: Great Cleave
feats.description: You can strike many nearby foes with a single mighty swing.

feats.name: Great Fortitude
feats.description: You are tougher than normal.

feats.name: Improved Initiative
feats.description: You can react faster than normal.

feats.name: Iron Will
feats.description: You have a stronger will than normal.

feats.name: Lightning Reflexes
feats.description: You have faster reflexes than normal.

feats.name: Maximize Spell
feats.description: You can cast spells to maximum effect.

benefits: Trade attack bonus for damage bonus
feats.name: Power Attack
feats.description: You can make exceptionally deadly melee attacks.

feats.name: Scribe Scroll
feats.description: You can create scrolls from known spells.

feats.name: Skill Focus
feats.description: You are particularly adept at a certain skill.

feats.name: Toughness
feats.description: You are tougher than normal.

benefits: Reduced penalties for fighting with two weapons
feats.name: Two-Weapon Fighting
feats.description: You can fight with a weapon in each hand.

benefits: Use Dex instead of Str for attack rolls with light weapons
feats.name: Weapon Finesse
feats.description: You are skilled at using your agility in melee combat.

benefits: +1 bonus on attack rolls with selected weapon
feats.name: Weapon Focus
feats.description: You are especially good at using a selected weapon.
